#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int arr[1009];
int dp[1003][1003];
long long top_down(int i,int j,int choice)
{
    long long left,right,ans;
    if(i>j) return 0;
    if(dp[i][j]!=-1) return dp[i][j];
    if(i==j)
    {
        if(choice==0) return arr[j];
        else return 0;
    }
    if(choice==0)
    {
        left = top_down(i+1,j,1);
        right = top_down(i,j-1,1);
        return dp[i][j] = max(arr[i]+left,arr[j]+right);
    }
    else if(choice==1)
    {
        if(arr[i]>arr[j])
        {
            return dp[i][j] = top_down(i+1,j,0);
        }
        else if(arr[i]<arr[j]) return dp[i][j] = top_down(i,j-1,0);
        else
        {
            int a = top_down(i,j-1,0);
            int b = top_down(i+1,j,0);
            return dp[i][j] = min(a,b);
        }
    }
}

int main()
{
  int tc;
  scanf("%d",&tc);
  while(tc--)
  {
      int n;
      for(int i=0;i<=1000;i++)
        for(int j=0;j<=1000;j++)
        dp[i][j]=-1;
      scanf("%d",&n);
      long long sum=0;
      for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
      {
          scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
          sum = sum+arr[i];
      }
      long long ans = top_down(0,n-1,0);
      long long second = sum - ans;
      if(ans>=second)
      {
          cout<<"1 "<<ans-second<<endl;
      }
      else
      {
          cout<<"2 "<<second-ans<<endl;
      }

  }
}
